name: INTERMONDE - DEMO
description:
This game supports English and Korean.

This is INTERMONDE Final Demo version! 

# How to Play [Keyboard]
  • Move : Direction Key
  • OK & Talk : Z
  • Cancel : X
  • Focus Mode : C
  • Use Prepared Item : V
  • Use Skill : Space
  • Change the skill : D, F
# Description

In the gap between the underworld and the earth world, where the creatures coexist, the story of Pren begins.
